Alias.name: help me
Alias.script: send('crt Requesting assistance at '..gmcp.Room.Info.name..' in '..gmcp.Room.Info.area..'!')-- you wimp

Alias.name: launch ship
Alias.script: sym.space.boarded = true sendAll("ship launch", 'say activate all') expandAlias("shipart") enableTimer("ships")

Alias.name: dock ship
Alias.script: sym.space.boarded = false send("ship dock") disableTimer("ships") sym.ui.adj.right:hide() sym.ui.adj.left:hide()

Alias.name: toggle
Alias.script: local hunting = sym.checkmodule('Hunting') sym.hunter.system[hunting and 'stop' or 'start']() sym.echo('Autohunting has been '..(hunting and 'disabled' or 'enabled')..'.')

Alias.name: set party size
Alias.script: sym.hunter.runner.config.party = tonumber(matches[2]) or #gmcp.Room.Players sym.echo('<0,128,128>Party Size: <128,128,0>' .. sym.hunter.runner.config.party .. '\n')
